statements: DELETE FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE quantity_change > 10 AND transaction_type = 'OUT';
DELETE FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_id = 101 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE product_id = 205 AND quantity_change > 10;
DELETE FROM InventoryTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM StockTransfers WHERE quantity_transferred < 10 AND destination_location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM transfers WHERE quantity>100 AND transaction_date<'2022-01-01';
